name: src/controleDeAcesso.js
content:
const AccessControl = require('accesscontrol')
const controle = new AccessControl()

controle
    .grant('assinante')
    .readAny('post', ['id', 'titulo', 'conteudo', 'autor'])
    .readAny('usuario', ['nome'])

controle
    .grant('editor')
    .extend('assinante')
    .createOwn('post')
    .deleteOwn('post')

controle
    .grant('admin')
    .readAny('post')
    .createAny('post')
    .deleteAny('post')
    .readAny('usuario')
    .createAny('usuario')
    .deleteAny('usuario')

module.exports = controle

name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "blog-do-codigo",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Um blog simples em Node.js",
  "main": "server.js",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "nodemon server.js",
    "debug": "nodemon --inspect server.js",
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1"
  },
  "license": "ISC",
  "dependencies": {
    "accesscontrol": "^2.2.1",
    "bcrypt": "^5.0.1",
    "body-parser": "^1.19.1",
    "dotenv": "^14.2.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "express": "^4.17.2",
    "jsonwebtoken": "^8.5.1",
    "moment": "^2.29.1",
    "nodemailer": "^6.7.2",
    "passport": "^0.5.2",
    "passport-http-bearer": "^1.0.1",
    "passport-local": "^1.0.0",
    "redis": "^3.0.2",
    "sqlite3": "^5.0.2"
  },
  "author": "Mateus Ribeiro",
  "devDependencies": {
    "nodemon": "^2.0.15"
  }
}
